content:
For people interested in the general ballpark of C.S. Peirce's logical graphs and G. Spencer Brown's Laws of Form, I started working in this area in the late 60s. A number of the Survey pages on my blog may provide initial fodder for discussion.

• Survey of Animated Logical Graphs
• Survey of Differential Logic
• Survey of Semiotics, Semiosis, Sign Relations
• Survey of Theme One Program

Regards,
Jon
